name: Underworld Survival
description:
You found yourself stuck in a underworld, with rescue coming and with weapons on you fight the monsters that will come and try to kill you... awaiting for what is more to come.

How to play:

-WASD - Player Movements

-Left Mouse Button - Shoot from the weapon

-1 2 3 Keys - Switch around the weapons

Features:

-Survival and Endless Mode

-Survival Mode, survive till rescue arrives from the time given on the top right corner 

-Endless Mode, Set your own record 

Assets:

-RGS_Dev

Font:

Daniel Zadorozny (Horroroid)
